snippet: A roundup of apps to help you get happy, or at least figure out what is stressful in your life.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column identifies mobile apps that help users think positively or aim at happiness.
lead_paragraph: A roundup of apps to help you get happy, or at least figure out what is stressful in your life.

headline.print_headline: Positive Thinking, With a Little Help From Your Phone
headline.main: Positive Thinking, With a Little Help From Your Phone
